price: ߊ߲ ߡߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߲߬ߓߊ ߕߘߍ߬ ߞߊ߲ߞߋߟߋ߲ߕߌ߯ ߘߌ߫، ߊ߲ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߲߬ߓߊ ߕߘߍ߬ ߔߊߟߊ߲ߞߊߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߫ ߠߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَمَا وَجَدۡنَا لِأَكۡثَرِهِم مِّنۡ عَهۡدٖۖ وَإِن وَجَدۡنَآ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَفَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā wajadnā li-aktharihim min ʿahdin wa-in wajadnā aktharahum lafāsiqīna
